actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the contributions of individuals of various ethnic backgrounds who contributed to the founding of the United States of America.

summary.text: Provides for the striking of, and furnishing to the American Revolution Bicentennial Administration, not more than 25,000 medals commemorating the contributions of persons of various ethnic backgrounds to the founding of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the contributions of individuals of various ethnic backgrounds who contributed to the founding of the United States of America.
